slogan: The search engine for French thesis

theseView.inscription: Enrolled in the doctoral program on
theseView.embargo: This thesis is under embargo until
theseView.modalContent:
Warning


The author of the thesis has not authorized its free distribution on the internet.

In accordance with the national regulations in force, defined,
  • between September 1, 2006, and September 1, 2016, by the decrees of August 7, 2006 relating to doctoral training and relating to the deposit, reporting, reproduction, dissemination, and conservation of thesis or works presented for defense for the doctorate,
  • from September 1, 2016, by the decree of May 25, 2016, establishing the national framework for training and the procedures leading to the award of the national diploma of doctorate, updated on August 26, 2022,

The thesis is only available within the French academic community. If you are a member of this academic community (students, teachers, researchers, staff), you can access the document by authenticating with the login and password you usually use within your affiliated institution.

As this thesis is a work of the mind, it is protected by the Intellectual Property Code. The file(s) that you will download as a member of the French academic community cannot be used outside the framework set by the right to private copying (Article L122-5, 2°, of the IPC). Any plagiarism or counterfeiting, as well as any unauthorized reproduction or dissemination outside the private framework, is strictly prohibited and exposes you to criminal penalties of up to 3 years' imprisonment and a fine of €300,000.
theseView.modalAgree: I have read the national regulations and terms of use for the thesis.

reportErrorView.question: Question *
reportErrorView.info: The data you see in theses.fr is the responsibility of the institutions authorized to award doctoral degrees. This form allows you to contact the relevant service within the institution responsible for the thesis:
reportErrorView.msg: Your message has been successfully transmitted.

footer.texte: Theses.fr is a search engine that lists all doctoral thesis defended in France since 1985, thesis topics prepared within French higher education institutions, and individuals involved in French doctoral research. The database is constantly evolving.
footer.logoAbesAlt: Access the website of the Bibliographic Agency for Higher Education
footer.logoMesriAlt: Access the website of the Ministry of Higher Education and Research

meta.desc: Search engine for French thesis, theses.fr provides access to defended or ongoing doctoral thesis.
meta.titre: Theses.fr, search engine for French thesis
meta.descResult: Result of the search engine for French thesis, theses.fr provides access to defended or ongoing doctoral thesis. With its search engine and facet navigation, the interface provides access to thesis data: title, doctoral candidate, disciplines, supervisors, defending institutions, doctoral schools, research partners, and defense date.
